name: KaijuJam2022
description:
My entry to KaijuJam 2022 ended up mostly being a learning exercise. Sorry it's not much fun to play!

The game was an experiment in texture painting, low-res retro textures, blender armature & animation, amongst other things. May do more with it, but for now it's a thingy.

Controls: Arrow Keys to steer rampaging Kaiju around to knock down the cardboard-box-like city.
